keywords.value: Symphony for the City of the Dead: Dmitri Shostakovich and the Siege of Leningrad (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

headline.main: M. T. Anderson’s ‘Symphony for the City of the Dead’

snippet: The story behind one of Dmitri Shostakovich’s greatest symphonies, composed as the assault on Leningrad unfolded.
abstract: Abby McGanney Nolan reviews book Symphony for the City of the Dead: Dmitri Shostakovich and the Siege of Leningrad by M T Anderson.
lead_paragraph: The story behind one of Dmitri Shostakovich’s greatest symphonies, composed as the assault on Leningrad unfolded.
